name: Alleyway Escape
description:
I created this game within a 3 week deadline, this was a vertical slice of muti-level game.

Goals of the game: 
You are an investigator whose daughter was murdered, find out who killed her and framed you, by escaping police with platform jumping gameplay and puzzle solving.

Player Objective:
Player is to escape the alleyways and reach on top of the big building of the inner city using simple push and jumping mechanics on objects.
As It is the first level, players can ring door bells and some people will give you hint and backstory on what happened in the game, this level will also introduce the player with platform jumping puzzles and pushing mechanics.
